name: Snatch quest
description:
Snatch Quest is a Game where you play in a Dungeon trying to avoid as much loot as possible!

Every time if the hero gathers more loot, his abilities to survive the Dungeon filled with monsters and traps will be more difficult and limited.

This Hero is a real kleptomaniac and has the need to gather a endless amount of loot.
You the player have to make the rightful choices to avoid filling the bag which can hold an endless amount of loot which makes his survivability very slim.
The game was intended to have a automatic scrolling level mechanic which pushes the player in narrow decision making with platforming.
